comment: Do not take her!  She is very inconsistent with what she says she will do and what she does.
Very frustrating professor. Was not clear about what she wanted and communication was nearly impossible. Highly regret taking this section.

Work is easy. The hard part is figuring out what she wants on disc posts. I lost points bc I didn't support my post but did with quotes from book. Need to ask a ?? Good luck on getting response. Comm skills suck. She messed up my grades and put me as 0. Had to call several times to get her to fix it. She's nice but not good online prof.

discussions are weighted too heavily in this class. made 100's on all other work and she never gave full credit for discussions, especially if she didn't agree with you on your view. have been on the deans list my entire college career and i made a C in this class!!!! wish like heck i would have taken someone else.

Dr. Bell is awesome! This is the fifth online course I have taken and by far the best designed online course. At first you may feel overwhelmed with everything, but after Week 3, you get in a flow. She is very up front about her guidelines and there are no surprises with her. Group projects are the toughest part of the course. Easy A if you try.
Heavy workload. Extremely picky on grading. Not an enjoyable class. Other professors are way better for INED.
